Card of Destiny: Hikari to Yami no Tougousha
name: Card of Destiny: Hikari to Yami no Tougou Mono
overview: Card of Destiny: Hikari to Yami no Tougou Mono is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Abel Software, which was released in Japan in 2002.
